programme.title: Day 1 - Faults & Time – 1.50m - CHI AL SHAQAB Presented by Longines 2026
programme.desc: CHI AL SHAQAB presented by Longines 2026, taking place from 18 to 22 February 2026, features world-class equestrian competition at the Al Shaqab venue in Doha. The event brings together leading international riders competing in top-level Jumping and Dressage, including Olympic and world champions, highlighting precision, technique, and excellence on one of the sport’s most prestigious stages.

programme.title: Inter vs Bodø/Glimt - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - Play-Offs -2nd leg
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions. The 2025/26 UEFA Champions League will be the second to be played under the new 36-team league phase. The final will be played on 30 May 2026 at Puskás Aréna in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.title: Inter vs Bodø/Glimt - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - Play-Offs -2nd leg

programme.title: Paris Saint-Germain vs Metz - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 23 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Paris SG have won their last 15 Ligue 1 matches against Metz, which is the second-longest winning streak for a team against a single opponent in the French top-flight, after PSG's current run against Angers. Paris SG have not lost any of their last 39 home Ligue 1 matches against promoted sides, since a defeat against Montpellier on 15th May 2010.

programme.title: Paris Saint-Germain vs Metz - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 23 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Paris SG have won their last 15 Ligue 1 matches against Metz, which is the second-longest winning streak for a team against a single opponent in the French top-flight, after PSG's current run against Angers. programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 27 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Following their 3-0 win at Anfield in November, Nottingham Forest are looking to complete their first league double over Liverpool since 1962-63. Liverpool have won just one of their last 15 away league games against Nottingham Forest, beating them 1-0 in March 2024 thanks to a late Darwin Núñez strike.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 27 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City are unbeaten in their last 21 Premier League home games against Newcastle, winning each of the last 16. Newcastle are looking to complete their first league double over Manchester City since 1983-84, and first in the top-flight since 1955-56. However, their 20 games at the Etihad Stadium is the most a team has played at a venue without ever winning in Premier League history.

programme.title: T100 2025 Highlights - Qatar
programme.desc: The Ultimate Pro Triathlon Tour. The 2025 T100 Triathlon World Tour takes the world's best pro triathletes on a globe-trotting adventure of 9 races as they fight it out across a season jam-packed with racing in iconic locations spanning April to December in the battle to be crowned T100 Triathlon World Champion.

programme.title: EN Spirit of Sport Series 11 | E3
programme.desc: This month on Spirit of Sport, Real Madrid and England footballer Jude Bellingham takes us back to the start of his journey in Birmingham and opens up about his mental health. Ahead of the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina, freestyle skier Eileen Gu reflects on her journey to gold. Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar and tennis icon Novak Djokovic spotlight the transformative power of sport and how they’re using their platforms to give back. England Lioness Georgia Stanway visits a special football project in London to inspire the next generation.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Spurs have lost their last three Premier League home games against Arsenal, as many as they had in their previous 23. They last lost four in a row against them between 1952 and 1955. Arsenal have won six of their last seven Premier League games against Spurs, including each of the last four. They last won five league games in a row against them between January 1987 and January 1989.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Manchester City are unbeaten in their last 21 Premier League home games against Newcastle, winning each of the last 16. In English top-flight history, only Everton have had a longer winning home run against an opponent. Newcastle are looking to complete their first league double over Manchester City since 1983-84, and first in the top-flight since 1955-56. However, their 20 games at the Etihad Stadium is the most a team has played at a venue without ever winning in Premier League history.

Newcastle are looking to complete their first league double over Manchester City since 1983-84, and first in the top-flight since 1955-56. However, their 20 games at the Etihad Stadium is the most a team has played at a venue without ever winning in Premier League history.

Crystal Palace vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 27
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won their last five Premier League home games against Wolves. It’s their longest winning run against an opponent in their top-flight history, while they last won six consecutive home league games against Walsall between 1977 and 2004. Wolves have lost eight of their last 10 Premier League games against Crystal Palace, while they’ve never beaten the Eagles in the competition when failing to keep a clean sheet.

Ath Bilbao vs Elche - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Athletic Club have not won any of their last two LaLiga outings against Elche, failing to score in both. The Basque side have only once before failed to score in three consecutive LaLiga matches against Elche, between 1984 and 1988. Elche CF have won two of their last four away games against Athletic Club in LaLiga, after failing to win any of their previous 20 visits to San Mamés in the top-flight.

programme.title: Ath Bilbao vs Elche - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25

programme.title: Osasuna vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Osasuna have not won any of their last 21 games against Real Madrid in LaLiga since a 1-0 victory in January 2011 with José Antonio Camacho as coach, their longest winless streak against a single opponent in the competition's history. Real Madrid are unbeaten in their last 10 LaLiga games at El Sadar against Osasuna, equalling the best unbeaten run by a visiting team at the hosts' ground in the competition's entire history, set by FC Barcelona between 1985 and 1993.

programme.title: Osasuna vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Osasuna have not won any of their last 21 games against Real Madrid in LaLiga since a 1-0 victory in January 2011 with José Antonio Camacho as coach, their longest winless streak against a single opponent in the competition's history. Real Madrid are unbeaten in their last 10 LaLiga games at El Sadar against Osasuna, equalling the best unbeaten run by a visiting team at the hosts' ground in the competition's entire history, set by FC Barcelona between 1985 and 1993.

programme.title: Deportivo Alaves vs Girona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Deportivo Alavés have won just one of their last five LaLiga encounters against Girona FC, a 1-0 away victory in April 2025. After five consecutive home victories in all competitions against Girona between 1957 and 2008, Alavés have only won two of their last eight home matches against them, a 1-0 win in the Segunda División in November 2015 and a 2-1 win in LaLiga in May 2019.

programme.title: Atletico Madrid vs Espanyol - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not won any of their last five games against Espanyol in LaLiga, their worst winless run against the Pericos in the competition since an eight-game streak between April 2004 and December 2007. Espanyol have claimed at least a draw in their last two visits to the Riyadh Air Metropolitano in LaLiga and could become only the fourth team to do so in three consecutive visits to the Rojiblancos' new stadium in the competition, after Barcelona, Real Madrid and Villarreal.

programme.title: Atletico Madrid vs Espanyol - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not won any of their last five games against Espanyol in LaLiga, their worst winless run against the Pericos in the competition since an eight-game streak between April 2004 and December 2007. Espanyol have claimed at least a draw in their last two visits to the Riyadh Air Metropolitano in LaLiga and could become only the fourth team to do so in three consecutive visits to the Rojiblancos' new stadium in the competition, after Barcelona, Real Madrid and Villarreal.

programme.title: Real Sociedad vs Real Oviedo - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Real Sociedad are unbeaten in their last 13 home league matches against Real Oviedo, since a 0-2 defeat in January 1976 – their best unbeaten home run against Real Oviedo in LaLiga. Following their 1-0 triumph at the Carlos Tartiere in August 2025, Real Oviedo have the chance to beat Real Sociedad twice in a single LaLiga season for the fifth time in history, having previously done so in 1934/35, 1941/42, 1947/48 and 1975/76.

programme.title: Real Betis vs Rayo Vallecano - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Real Betis have not won any of their last four LaLiga games against Rayo Vallecano, their second-worst winless run against the 'franjirrojos' in the top-flight, after a nine-game streak without a win between March 2002 and April 2014. Rayo Vallecano have drawn their last three LaLiga matches against Real Betis and have only recorded four consecutive draws against two teams in the competition's entire history: against Burgos in October 1979 and against Deportivo de La Coruña in May 1994.

RCL have also never scored more than three goals in three consecutive top-flight games against a single opponent in the competition.

programme.title: Toulouse vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Toulouse have won each of their last two home games against Paris FC in all competitions, both in Ligue 2, which is more than they had in their previous five such encounters. Should they win, Toulouse would have 33 points in Ligue 1 in 2025-26, their highest tally after 23 top-flight games of a season since 2011-12.

programme.title: Auxerre vs Rennes - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Auxerre have kept a clean sheet in 46% of their Ligue 1 matches against Rennes in the 21st century, including six in their last nine home games. This is their highest ratio against any team they have faced at least 15 times in the competition during this period. Auxerre are unbeaten in their last three Ligue 1 matches and could avoid defeat in four consecutive top-flight games for the first time since March/April 2025.

programme.title: Paris Saint-Germain vs Metz - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Paris SG have won their last 15 Ligue 1 matches against Metz, which is the second-longest winning streak for a team against a single opponent in the French top-flight, after PSG's current run against Angers. Paris SG have not lost any of their last 39 home Ligue 1 matches against promoted sides, since a defeat against Montpellier on 15th May 2010.

programme.title: Angers SCO vs Lille - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Angers SCO have lost each of their last three Ligue 1 matches against Lille OSC without scoring and could lose four consecutive top-flight games against the same opponent without finding the net for only the second time in the club's history, after doing so against Nantes between 1969 and 1971. Angers SCO have failed to score on 21 occasions in Ligue 1 since the start of last season, more than any other team.

programme.title: Nimes vs Saint-Raphael - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Angers SCO vs Lille - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Angers SCO have lost each of their last three Ligue 1 matches against Lille OSC without scoring and could lose four consecutive top-flight games against the same opponent without finding the net for only the second time in the club's history, after doing so against Nantes between 1969 and 1971. programme.title: Auxerre vs Rennes - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Auxerre have kept a clean sheet in 46% of their Ligue 1 matches against Rennes in the 21st century, including six in their last nine home games. Toulouse vs Chambery - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Sporting Cristal (PER) vs 2 de Mayo (PAR) - Copa Libertadores 2026 - Phase 2 - 2nd Leg
programme.desc: The 2026 Copa Libertadores is the highest level of competition in South American club football. The competition began on 3 February and is scheduled to end on 28 November 2026, with the final to be played in Montevideo, Uruguay. Flamengo are the defending champions.
